attributes.action: reverse the decision to abandon teaching the grammar rule "I before E except after C".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Support for Spelling, is being distributed to more than 13,000 primary schools and advises teachers to abandon teaching the rule "I before E except after C, when the sound is EE, or when the sound is A as in neighbour and weigh." This is foolishness beyond belief and invites further failings in the education system.
